allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Sourcing Projects Dashboard

Full-stack dashboard for managing sourcing team projects:
- React + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS frontend
- Node.js + Express + TypeScript backend
- PostgreSQL database with Knex.js
- JWT authentication
- Project CRUD with filtering
- Analytics and charts
- "Lack of Hours" tracking feature

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix TypeScript errors for production build

- Remove unused ChevronRight import in ClientsPage
- Remove unused Card component imports in OverviewPage
- Fix getModelClass parameter type to accept undefined

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
